name: Lightmare
description:
Entry for the Ludum Dare 39 and the topic "Running out of Power".

In school. Lights out. Don’t die!

Made by:

  • Polona Caserman
  • Alvar Gamez Zerban
  • Robert Konrad
  • Christian Reuter

Additional graphics by Martin Konrad. Music by Lewis Lepton.

Made with Kore (source code available at Github).
